streamer.no_videos: You have not upload any videos yet.
streamer.videos_selected: videos on this page has been selected
streamer.delete_video_modal_description: The selected video(s) will be permanently deleted. You will lose all data such from your videos as views, comments & ratings. Are you sure?
streamer.delete_all_video_modal_title: All of your videos will be permanently deleted. You will lose all datas such from your videos as views, comments & ratings. Are you sure?
streamer.edit_tags_description: Adding keywords help your viewers to find yours videos easily. Enter a comma after each word.
streamer.edit_comment_description: Enable or disable your viewers to comment on the video

change_password.title: Change password
change_password.desc: Please enter your old and new password. Make sure your password is alphanumeric with at least 8 characters.
change_password.success_desc: Your password has been successfully updated.

forgot_password.title: Reset password
forgot_password.desc: Enter email address for your account
forgot_password.create_password_desc: Please enter your new password and make sure your password is alphanumeric with at least 8 characters.
forgot_password.reset_success_desc: Good news! You are just few steps away to login to MOVE. Click on the button below to login.
forgot_password.reset_fail_desc: Your account verification has expired. Please verify your account again to enjoy full access on MOVE.
forgot_password.send_mail_error: Email {email} is not found. Please try again
forgot_password.send_mail_success_after: . Click the link in the email to reset your password.
forgot_password.send_mail_success: We've sent an email to { email }. Click the link in the email to reset your password.

user_profile.title: Settings
user_profile.username_8_255_long: Username must be between 4 and 25 characters
user_profile.username_verify_message: Username must contain only letters, numbers, and underscores
user_profile.fullname_no_special_characters: Full name must not include special characters and numbers.
user_profile.invalid_age: Invalid age. Age must be between 13 and 65 years old
user_profile.file_exceed_5MB: The file size exceeds the maximum limit of 5MB. Please choose a smaller file and try again.

logout.title: Log Out
logout.desc: Are you sure to log out?

otp_verify.title: Verify your email to keep account secure
otp_verify.desc: We sent a 6-digit code to your email. Enter the code below to confirm your account. You may also tap on the link in the email we sent you.

error_message.invalid_password: You have entered an invalid password
error_message.password_length: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters
error_message.strong_password: Please choose a stronger password. Try a combination of letters, numbers, and special character
error_message.match_password: The confirmation password does not match the new password.
error_message.referral_code: Referral code must be 8 alphanumeric characters
error_message.banned: You've entered the wrong OTP too many times. Your account is locked for 10 minutes. Please try again later

upload_video.title: Upload a video
upload_video.drag_drop: Drag and drop your video to upload
upload_video.search_keywords_sub: Adding keywords help your viewers to find your videos easily. Enter a comma after each word, only accepted (letters, numbers, commas)
upload_video.comment_sub: Enable or disable your viewers to comment on the video.
upload_video.confirm_text: Your video is not published yet, you will lose all details in your video. Are you sure to close this window?
upload_video.progress_text: Feel free to add your video details, tags and settings in the meantime!

search.try_another_keyword: Please try searching with a different keyword.
search.page_not_found_message: The page you looking for does not exit.
